translations: v．撒小谎，说慌（fib的过去式和过去分词）
他对自己的年龄撒了个小谎。

sentences.sentence: Have you ever fibbed on an employment application to increase your chances of being hired?
sentences.translation: 你是否曾经为了增加被雇佣的机会而在求职申请上弄虚作假呢？

sentences.sentence: Jeff Hancock found that in tests, when it came to dating, men exaggerated their height and women fibbed about their weight on-line.
sentences.translation: Jeff Hancock发现，在试验中，约会中的男人们夸大自己的身高而女人夸小自己的体重。
